tweet: $BTC is pure ponzi now.  It disgusts me.  The dream was corrupted.  I have donated mine to the Ethereum Foundation.  I don't want it.  $BCH has some hope of recovering the original Bitcoin vision.  $ZEC and $XMR have valid use-cases.  $BTC is unusable.   https://t.co/I17pRBcC9t  https://t.co/2b7AIzbr6F
